snippet.title: Sym.BIOS: Torn Asunder Announcement Teaser
snippet.description:
Cassiopeia Developments are proud to announce Sym.BIOS: Torn Asunder, a sci-fi visual novel coming in Spring 2023! 
Featuring a great story with moral choices by Gabrielle Giloux, stunning background art by Luan Kodra, Laura Michel, Stefano Manente, character art by Anne-Raphaëlle Pichon and concept art by Apolline Tardieu.
It will feature an exceptional original soundtrack by Sekond Prime as well as the new single by rising indie pop icon Primo the Alien, Beginning of Us, which is out today!
Music Credits: 
Beginning of Us by Primo the Alien, used with permission.
The song is available here:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=BjxSlzCQEtY&ab_channel=PrimotheAlien-Topic
https://music.apple.com/us/album/beginning-of-us-single/1661204927
https://open.spotify.com/album/0JDXXu9saDApZmraaM449R
https://www.deezer.com/en/album/389563547?deferredFl=1
